text: Michael “Mike” Rianda (born December 25, 1984), is an American cartoonist, director, writer and voice actor. He is known for his work on Gravity Falls as a creative director and writer for Season 1, and creative designer for Season 2. He is also known for directing, co-writing and co-starring his feature directorial debut The Mitchells vs. the Machines. == Filmography == === Film === Year Title Director Writer Other Voice Notes 2021 The Mitchells vs. the Machines Yes Yes Yes Aaron Mitchell / Talking Dog / Furbies / Wi-Fi Enthusiast 2023 Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse No No Yes Ezekiel Sims / Spider- Therapist; cameo Production consultant Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem No No Yes Wants a Paycheck Goon / Chop Shop Boss / Ratatouille Guard 2024 Untitled The Mitchells vs. the Machines cute young porn on a cloudy spin- off film No No No Aaron Mitchell TBA I, Chihuahua No Story No — === Television === Year Title Writer Other Voice Notes 2012–2016 Gravity Falls Yes Yes Lee, Thompson, Mr. Poolcheck, Additional Voices Creative director (season 1) Creative consultant (season 2) 2021 Inside Job No Yes — Consultant (episode: "Unpresidented") 2022 Amphibia No Yes — Special thanks (episode: "The Hardest Thing") == References == Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors
